text: Gabriel Fauré's Piano Quintet in C minor, Op. 115, is the second of his two works in the genre. Dedicated to Paul Dukas, the Piano Quintet No. 2 was given its premiere in Paris at a concert of the Société Nationale de Musique on 2 May 1921. There are four movements *Allegro moderato *Allegro vivo *Andante moderato *Allegro molto The playing time of the quintet is about 30 minutes.Murray, p. 159 ==References== ==Sources== * Category:Compositions by Gabriel Fauré Category:Compositions for piano quintet Category:Compositions in C minor
title: Piano Quintet No. 2 (Fauré)
